DOC.brief_summary: This project will facilitate the optimization of body MR imaging at 3 Tesla.
DOC.brief_title: Abdominal MR Imaging at 3.0T: Sequence Optimization and Implementation
DOC.detailed_description: This project is meant to improve the image quality of multiple sequences at 3.0T applied to the abdominal and pelvic regions.
DOC.criteria: Subjects between ages of 19 and 65 Healthy volunteer subjects should not have any history of disease or symptoms based on clinical history Subjects with an underlying disorder (diffuse and focal abnormalities of the liver and pancreas) Inability to provide informed consent A medical or contraindications that will prevent subjects from having a MRI Subjects with severe renal dysfunction or patients on dialysis
